name: Shadow of The Morrigan
description:
This is my submission for Adventure Jam 2022.

You play as Ruairì in a Forgotten Irish Land...
This game is a 1st person narrative adventure with some puzzles (Take notes on paper to help you solve the puzzles).

Created by Simon Mesnard, based on writings by Roger Kilroy-Talbot.

Made in Unity with Adventure Creator, Unity Terrain and various assets (free rocks, trees, bushes, etc.).
Music: https://incompetech.com/music/

- NEW GAMEPLAY UPDATE! A new version 0.5 has been added 2 days after the end of Adventure Jam. I highly recommend to play this version. The content of the game is identical but I have changed the gameplay and fixed various game breaking issues, and added a minimap.

- Forgot to say in the gameplay tutorial that it's possible to RUN by holding shift key (either left or right). You will need it on long distances!
